text: @MyOtterName @ChristianLament @chrissyteigen lady you need to get a grip

@ChristianLament @chrissyteigen This was lovely.  Ignore the trolls.  You're right.  Chrissie was made for twitter and it was made for her.  No one uses it as effectively, and with such true intentions as she.  I'm glad she's back, too.

@chrissyteigen I've missed you more than the character limit allows me to say, Chrissy.

Twitter has been black and white since you took your color away...and as long as it's healthy for you and yours, please stay and brighten our day, as we try to brighten yours.
turns out it feels TERRIBLE to silence yourself and also no longer enjoy belly chuckles randomly throughout the day and also lose like 2000 friends at once lol
